name.en: Experiments of Electrical Circuits and Electronics

goal.en: Learning by operating electrical and electronics derive from developing electrical and circuit analysis and diagonal ability.
goal.ch: 學習使用基本的電子電路儀器，透過實務操作，培養對電子電路分析和偵錯的基本能力。

content.en:
1. Electric meter and power supply application experiment
2. Resistor network analysis experiment
3. Thevenin and Norton equivalent circuit experiments
4. Function generator and oscilloscope experiments
5. Static characteristic measurement I-V curve experiment
6. Time domain analysis of first-order system
7. Frequency domain analysis of sine wave response
8. Operational amplifier experiment
9. Transistor amplifier circuit measurement (DC bias)
10. Transistor amplifier circuit measurement(AC signal amplification)
11. Speaker driver circuit
content.ch:
1. 三用電表及電源供應器實驗
2. 電阻網路分析實驗
3. 戴維寧與諾頓實驗
4. 產波器與示波器實驗
5. 靜態特性量測I-V曲線實驗
6. 一階時域動態量測
7. 頻域動態特性量測弦波響應
8. 運算放大器實驗
9. 電晶體放大電路(直流偏壓)
10. 電晶體交流訊號放大
11. 喇叭驅動電路

en.Assessments: Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance
Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance
